title.narrative: APSM II - Saferworld, CRSS, OESP Regional support to the peace process 2021-2022
APSM II - Saferworld, CRSS, OESP Regionalt stöd till fredsprocessen 2021-2022

description.narrative:
Saferworld, CRSS and OESP has applied to Sida/EU APSM for funding of 3 050 000 SEK to carry out the "Supporting an Inclusive Peace in Afghanistan: Regional Dynamics and the Afghan Peace Process" in Afghanistan and Pakistan during the period July 2021-June 2022.
The aim of Saferworld, CRSS and OESP's project is to establish sustainable channels of Track 2 and 1.5 communication across Afghanistan and Pakistan that integrate the perspectives of a diverse group of actors, and that moreover encourage Pakistan’s constructive engagement in the Afghan peace process. One expected outcome from formalising and establishing the channels for exchange is a demonstrated greater awareness among Afghan and Pakistani decision-makers on areas relevant to the Afghan peace process, moving beyond immediate securitised priorities to mutual opportunities. The project builds on the Beyond Boundaries dialogues OESP and CRSS have been running since 2015, and with Saferworld since 2017 which has worked to promote improved bilateral relations between Afghanistan and Pakistan, enhancing regional cooperation and establishing confidence-building measures and avenues for further collaboration in the areas of trade and economic connectivity.

Saferworld, Center for Research and Strategic Studies (CRSS) och Organization for Economic Studies and Peace (OESP) har ansökt om 3 050 000 SEK från Sida/EU APSM för att genomföra projektet "Supporting an Inclusive Peace in Afghanistan: Regional Dynamics and the Afghan Peace Process" i Afghanistan och Pakistan mellan juli 2021-juni 2022.
Projekt har för avsikt att etablera hållbara kanaler för track 1-2 kommunikation mellan Afghanistan och Pakistan som integrerar perspektiv från regionen och som kan bidra till att utveckla en mer konstruktiv roll för Pakistan i den afghanska fredsprocessen. Projektet bygger på Beyond Boundaries-dialogerna som parterna drivit mellan Afghanistan och Pakistan sedan 2015 för att förbättra bilaterala relationer mellan Afghanistan och Pakistan och regionalt samarbete inom områden som handel och ekonomisk integration.

sector.narrative: Women’s rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

tag.narrative: 16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
